content.question: Which of the following conclusions can be made regarding maroon communities being located in areas that were ’naturally difficult [to] access’?

choices.label: They were situated along the colony’s coastal regions.
They were located in remote environments beyond the control of enslavers.
They were guarded by former soldiers enslaved during the civil wars in the Kingdom of Kongo.
They were given protection as a result of treaties made with colonial governments.

content.answer: They were located in remote environments beyond the control of enslavers.
